FREE 30 day Platinum trials

Hips
Wednesday, August 9th, 2017, 11:01:52 PM

Want to try a free 30 day trial of Platinum? Use this link to sign up at any time!

Perks include:

  • 725 simucoins a month
  • Custom titles at levels 60, 80, & 100
  • Custom permanent familiars for wizards upon learning 920
  • Custom alters for ranger companions upon learning 630
  • Private property points which accrue monthly if you own a private home
  • 125-slot lockers in all towns
  • Portal system allowing near-instantaneous transport for a flat fee of 10k a month
  • Monthly raffles
  • Monthly customization raffles
  • Moltin's dicing game
  • Higher drop rates at digging/Dusk Ruin/Summit Academy
  • Beta testing (ex. moonshard pendants at DR, the first Reim release, playershops)

Sign up now and come try GemStone Platinum!

Wednesday, August 9th, 2017, 11:20:25 PM

Try it free. All you need to do is send them your account's email address through their form at the link above. It takes a couple of days but you will have access to Gemstone Platinum instance and forums. You won't get an email notification so watch for the Plat forum section to pop up, keep trying to log in, or check your account subscription status until you see Gemstone Platinum Free Trial show up.
